solution_code:
def findLongestChain(pairs):
    pairs.sort(key = lambda x: x[1]) #sort by end element of pair
    curr, ans = pairs[0][1], 1
    for pair in pairs:
        if pair[0] > curr: #if start of current pair > end of last pair in chain
            curr = pair[1] #update the end to current pair's end
            ans += 1 #increase chain length
    return ans
